text: he payagambara! Je kami pana tamari tarapha tamara palanahara taraphathi avatarita karavamam avyum che, te pahoncadi do, jo tame avum na karyu to tame allahani payagambari purna na kari, ane tamane allaha ta'ala lokothi bacavi lese, ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala inkara karanara'one satyamarga nathi batavato
